main event: A disc-shaped object with lights on the bottom that changed color from red to green was observed hovering about 40 feet in the air over a house for about 20-25 minutes.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a quarter as observed.
Several neighbors also observed the object.
The report describes three lights, one red and two white, appearing to be traveling in a definite pattern and in fixed formation.
The objects were estimated to have a diameter of about 50-75 feet.
The objects exhibited a low intensity, diffused brilliant light, quite different from very bright, very white objects.
sighted object: disc-shaped object with lights on the bottom that changed color from red to green
